faq.question: How many team members can I add?
faq.answer: Team plan includes unlimited team members. Pay per seat: $49/month includes 5 seats, then $10/month per additional member.

faq.question: Can I create multiple teams or workspaces?
faq.answer: Yes! Create separate workspaces for different projects, departments, or clients. Each workspace has its own library and permissions.

faq.question: What permissions can I set?
faq.answer: Four roles: Owner (full access), Admin (manage members), Editor (upload, summarize, comment), Viewer (read-only). Set permissions per workspace or individual documents.

faq.question: Can team members have different access levels?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Assign different roles to different members. Create viewer-only accounts for external collaborators.

faq.question: Is there a limit on team documents?
faq.answer: Team plan includes unlimited document storage. Process and store as many PDFs as your team needs.

faq.question: Can we use SSO for login?
faq.answer: Enterprise plans support SSO with Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, Okta, or custom SAML. Contact sales for SSO setup.

faq.question: What happens to documents if a member leaves?
faq.answer: Documents remain in the team library. Reassign ownership to active members. Former members lose access immediately.

faq.question: Can I try team features before upgrading?
faq.answer: Yes! Start a 14-day free trial of the Team plan. Invite your team and test all collaboration features risk-free.
